name: Paysanne
description:
Concept

Fulfill villagers' orders by reaping grains and cooking bread in this small farming sim! Paysanne is my first game and it was built for the Major-Jam 3: Retro. The limitation was for the game to have a 96x96 resolution.  Thank you for giving it a shot:)

Credits

Xavier Normant - Game Design, Programming, Art, UI
Samuel Ross - Game Design, Music
